001package gbw.melange.common.elementary.contraints;
002
003public record Anchor(double x, double y) {
004
005    public Anchor {
006        //Constructor
007        assert x > 0 && x <= 1 && y > 0 && y <= 1;
008    }
009    public Anchor(Anchor ref) {
010        //Constructor
011        this(ref.x, ref.y);
012    }
013}
